trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework supplies two specialized classes that derive from DataGridViewElement: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>, which represents individual elements, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>, which represents a series of grouped subelements.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供兩個特製化的類別衍生自 DataGridViewElement: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>，用來表示個別的項目和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>，用來表示一系列的群組的子元素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A> property to `null`.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>與這個項目相關聯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control that contains this element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>控制項，其中包含這個項目。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called when the element is associated with a different <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的其他項目時呼叫<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentDoubleClick"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Gets the user interface (UI) state of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得項目的使用者介面 (UI) 狀態。

trans-unit.source: The states specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> values are enforced by the UI but may be programmatically overruled.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的狀態<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates>值強制執行的 UI，但可能會以程式設計的方式取消。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values representing the state.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref>代表狀態的值。
